inn1.comm: on a length outside off, driven firmly straight to mid off
again on a length, driven straight to mid off
tucked away to the leg side this time to get off the mark
boundary! wafts at the width outside off stump, and the thick edge flies away to third man for four
again room outside off, but this time Tamim does not cash in. It goes straight to mid off
four more! Width outside off, some movement for Praveen, but Tamim in this form is seeing it well and hitting it sweetly. Races away through the covers
tails into the pads first up, flicked away nicely to square leg for three
roobish ball, dealt with perfectly! Short and wide outside off, Kayes says thank you very much and whacks it square
finally, Zak gets the right length, darts away from the left hander from back of a length, leaves him in no man's land as he thinks about prodding at it
slips down the leg this time
very ordinary start from India here. No pace, no movement, doled out on a length and the batsman goes through with the lofted drive over wide mid off
and again. Zaheer is taking some serious tap! Another nothing ball outside off, and whacked through, a little squarer than the last time but four more all the same
and a good ball to finish a bad over, bounces from a length and catches Kayes by surprise, but he lets it go
back of a length on middle and leg, he gets behind a plays a rare defensive shot down to the on side
well, width and length again.. this was short and wide outside off, enough room for a whiplash cut that bisected the covers and ran away
better length and tighter line. No room for the cut this time, so it is played away quietly to the off side

Whoop! Shades of Saeed Anwar there! Not a very bad ball, this one was straying marginally down the leg, Tamim got his front foot across, and picked it off his hips and flicked it high and handsome over square leg.

aaaaand gone! Praveen persists with the 'Hit me' length ball outside off, Tamim goes for it again, driving uppishly, but could not find the gap. Raina takes a nice tumbling catch at cover, and India have redeemed a start that was rapidly going away from them. Praveen looks angry.. He always does! Whaddaplaya!
seams away from back of a length outside off, Ashraful rises on his toes and lets it go
more like the Zaheer we know. 136 kph, rising menacingly from a length and moving away. It is to Kayes' credit that he managed to not nick it.
hits the deck again, outside off, Kayes gets behind the line
another gem of an away-seamer outside off, luring Kayes into the uncertain prod, but he pulled the back in just as it darted away
continues to work outside off, this one dies after bouncing and Dhoni uses his pads to stop it
pitches up the sucker delivery on middle, but this one does not move away, and Kayes punch-drives, straight to mid on
Kayes is stuck in fisherman's cove here! Another peach of an away-swinger, Kayes is in a trance as he pokes the bat at it, but the ball was too good for him to nick. Great over
short and wide outside off, but Ashraful lets it pass
and again.. Praveen was testing the umpire with his past couple of balls, well outside off and this time it is called.
Brute! Praveen bowls at a friendly pace of 126 kph, but there was nothing friendly about the way that one took off from outside off. Ashraful just about sirvives nicking it
again wide outside off, but this time Ashraful keeps his distance as it passes
good ball, straightens from the leg stump and Ashraful gets behind and blocks to mid on
outside off once again, Ashraful shoulders arms
ah! Good ball to finish, he has seamed away all over, so swings in for the last ball. Ashraful spotted it and played the forward defensive to cover
Zak jags one back in and makes it very uncomfortable for the batsman. Kayes keeps it away, and Zak is rediscovering his mojo here
tight line outside off, not much movement, Kayes gets forward and defends to covers
slightly shorter but no width at all as Kayes looks to cut. Hits it hard into the ground and it is fielded by point
ducks into the left hander again, rapping him high on the pads and rolling to the off side
Peach! Jumps up from a length and moves away, as Kayes weaves away uncertainly - this unexpected bounce has always been Zaheer's strength
and a fine counter-punch from Kayes to end the over. This was pitched up a tad, and moved away slightly, but it was in the slot, Kayes took the challenge and drilled it straight of mid on for four.
short and wide outside off, Ashraful undercuts it and it bounces high over the head of slip and Ashraful is away with a couple to third man
back to the business length outside off, Ashraful plays the textbook back foot defence
length ball, exploring leg stump and straightening on the right hander, but Ashraful was adept to get forward and defend to point
shortens the length this time, pushes Ashraful back and he rises on his toes to defend to point
finally some innovation. Again back of a length outside off, but this time instead of the tame block, Ashraful opens the face and guides it to third man to scamper a couple
angled into the left hander, pushing him back and forcing him to fend to the leg side
class! Zaheer does it again, angles in, lands and then goes the other way leaving Kayes bemused and befuddled, but without a chance of getting bat on it.
back of a length again, Kayes stays back and is uncomfortable with this line of attack. Defended to the off side
oh well. Every now and then Zaheer pitches one up, and Kayes is waiting for these like a child waits all year for Christmas. He pounces on it and smokes it through the covers
slightly off target, slipping on to Kayess pads and he tucks it away for a couple
and back to the off stump channel to finish off. Kayes gets behind the line and defends to cover
short of a length again from Praveen, on leg stump line and straightening. Ashraful is in a very cautious zone today, not going after these the way we expect him to
again, enough width outside off to elicit an almightly swing from the Ashraful of old. Today he meekly guides it to point
tight line just outside off, Ashraful looks to angle it away to the off side, but can't get it away
strays on the pads and Ashraful lofts it over the infield at midwicket for three
round the wickets this time and angled into Kayes who stays ack and defend to the leg side
that's a very tight call for wide outside off. Praveen looks disillusioned!
angled across, cut away and fumbled in the circle, it runs close to the off side fence before Nehra can get across and tidy up
overpitched on off stump, driven hard into the ground, the fielder at short cover jumps up and fields on the bounce
sprayed well wide of off. Easy call for wide
back of a length outside off, guided off the backfoot to point
that might have been the first single of the day, but Harbhajan Singh fumbled to give away two.
defends the short of length ball outside off
drfits on to Ashraful's pads, but he can't cash in and it goes straight to midwicket
shortens the length, but on leg stump again and Ashraful plays watchfully off his pads to midwicket.
SINGLE! Cherish the moment folks! Praveen gets it to slant in, and Kayes' attempted guide to third man goes off the inside edge to fine leg.
short ball outside off, Ashraful fishes for it, looking to upper cut and makes no contact
stock ball from Praveen, keeps it steady outside off, he gets behind the line and taps
whoa! Slants into Ashraful who looks to glance and it loops down the leg side off thigh pad, Dhoni tumbles across and fails to pouch it cleanly, but saves some runs
defended from middle and leg line to the leg side. Ashraful is still on neutral gear.. he's not even revving the engine. Probably searching for his keys
and again. Tame defence outside off to end the over.
Nehra starts this over with a poor ball, strays on to the pads, Kayes gets back rises and flicks it off his thighs behind square
and again. There is rust in the air and it is coming from the Indian pacemen, in their first couple of overs. Nehra serves a buffet ball outside off and Kayes whacks it confidently through the covers
better line, closer to off and not full enough for the drive. Kayes opens the face and plays it to the off side
short and not so wide outside off, ashraful cuts it and it scurries down to the fielder behind square in the deep.
hint of away swing from Praveen, starts from middle and moves away. Ashraful nudges to the off side and looks for a single, but no luck
good ball. Opens him up with the away movement, from leg to off, and the leading edge pops up safely towards the covers
goes outside off this time, Ashraful bends, reaches out and guides it to third man
short and slow outside off, Tamim stays back and guides to third man.
ah, releases the intensity with another gift. On leg stump, Ashraful has no problems glancing it very fine off the back foot
compensates and lands this outside off, Ashraful opens the face and runs it behind point for a single.
width, and Ashraful is getting into the groove. Square-driven nicely along the ground and Harbhajan moved across too slowly from third man to cut it off

ah! With Ashraful, you know the brain freeze is just around the corner, and here it is. Having played watchfully all along, one boundary has brought the impetuosity back. He goes for an ill-advised hoick off a short of length ball on leg stump. It was there to be hit, yes, but that was not the right shot. It ballooned off the top edge, high over square leg, but Praveen Kumar stayed put and took a nicely judged catch near the rope
back of a length outside off, stays back and opens the face to guide it behind square on the off side
slips down the leg, close to the batsman but makes no contact. Duly called.
banged in short, without much effort though. Rahim stays back, rides the bounce and defends softly
length ball on middle and off, defended off the front foot towards the off side
short and wide outside off, a more set batsman would have hit it for a boundary, but Rahim bunts it down to third man for one
nice bouncer, not with much pace, but has Rahim in a tangle as he swishes at it without conviction. One for the over
over-pitched on leg, and whipped airily into the empty on side field, and it pulls up near the ropes.
angles into Kayes, tucked away off the back foot towards square leg and Jadeja's alert fielding keeps them down to one
angles across Rahim from over the stumps, and he lets it pass
more defence, to a length ball on middle and off.
movement for Nehra, for the first time today. Darts away from outside off and Kayes flirts with it, but nothing serious

Gone. Kayes perishes to a bouncer that involved some effort, but had little pace. Kayes went for the pull but was hopelessly late on the shot, it popped up for a simple catch inside the circle at midwicket
Nehra has his tail up now. Puts in more effort into the bouncer and has Shakib in some trouble. He fends it uncomfortably to the off side
ah, another good ball, but this time Shakib gets a healthy outside edge and it flies to the thirdman boundary. What's more, it hits the sponsors board there, making Shakib richer by $1500!
and he picks a single to the leg side to finish the over.
tossed up from round the wicket., defends the off spinner off front foot
lousy ball. Harbhajan sprays it well wide of leg stump and it rolls away for five wides
flighted outside off, cut away but straight to point

Beauty! Harbhajan has OWNED Shakib with the perfect straighter one. It was tossed up again, Shakib got forward, but was a fraction short of the pitch of the ball. He could not smother the lack of spin, as it darted in through the bat-pad gap to knock the pegs. Class. It was intended as an offie, but it did not turn away.
offie from over the wickets, blocked watchfully off the back foot
tight lines outside off, whizzes past the outside edge as he looks to guard his castle
ooh, short but not very wide, looks to cut and under-edges it perilously close to the stumps
armer pitched up on middle and going through, hits the pads as he defends. but the appeal was refused
off the pads again, into Sehwag's hands at slip. Stifled appeal
flighted outside off and driven to the covers, fielded well
good ball again, tight lines on middle and leg, defended watchfully down the track
and he breaks the shackles with a slog-sweep and finds the gap. Nicely done
turns across from middle to leg, turned away to midwicket for one
served up on off, but played watchfully by Rahim down the pitch
subtle change in line, from middle to leg this time, defended watchfully to the leg side
quicker one fired on the pads and worked away behind square for one
more defence. Gets forward and blocks from leg stump line
turns into the right-hander who looks to glance off the back foot but can't beat short fine leg
opens the face outside off and taps it into the covers for a single
pitched up on off stump, looks to steal one to the off side, but point intervenes
looks to defends to the off side again, but gets an inside edge to the leg side
shorter, looks to cut and finds point
nudged into the off side and they think of a single and then rethink
finally gets one away, short outside off and cut towards sweeper cover
sharpish turn and flight from Bhajji. Pops up off the edge into the leg side behind square for a single
pops up again, thanks to the flight variations, and nearly carries back to Bhajji
defended more solidly to the leg side
turns in from outside off, and Rahim plays around it as he thinks of working it to the leg side
drifts to middle and leg, he guides it behind square leg this time
turns in to Mahmudllah, who can't work it away off his hips
back of a length outside off and nudged away to the covers for a quick single
lovely variation! Sharp turn and a quicker ball caught Mahmudullah napping, rapped him in the pads and it seemed headed for middle and leg. The appeal is turned down.
gets it away to the off side from off stump line for a single
stout defence. Rahim has decided that nothing is getting past him today.
and again. If Bangladesh were in the other World Cup, he would have made an effective goallie.
loop, turn, bite and bounce. And watchful defence. To the leg side off the front foot.
worked away for a single this time
turns into Rahim who tucks it away off the pads for one
thats nicely done. Bhajji tossed it right up, looking for the sharp break into the batsman, and Mahmudullah was up to the task, rocking well back and cutting it authoritatively for four
on to the pads this time and nurdled away for one behind square leg
more stout defence from Rahim, back to the bowler
speared in from wide of the crease and straightens. Defended to the off side
same ball, same shot
slightly shorter, batsman rocks back and tips to the off side
tossed up on leg stump, draws Rahim forward and he defends to mid on
ooh, that nearly got through! Quicker and slightly shorter, hurried into the cut and chopped on almost on to the stumps. Squeezes it away to the leg side for a couple
this one's worked away behind square leg, and Praveen Kumar fumbles a regulation pick-up
on leg stump, looks to sweep and gets it away towards short fine
more flight, drifting in and turning further in, flicked away square
lovely bowling this, rips in from outside off, defeats the forward prod and hits the pads, but outside the line of off
a hint of inside edge this time, it dribbles away to the leg side
tosses up, turn and bounce, but Rahim waits on it and rides it behind square on the off side
Venom! That kicked off the turf and flashed past the befuddled batsman and thudded into Dhoni who took a nasty blow. All is well though.
looped outside off, batsman gets forward and defends to the offside
slightly shorter, opens the face and looks to run it away past short third, but it is fielded
pitched well up, elicits the off drive, out into the deep
flighted on middle stump and defended watchfully
ah.. that's hit umpire Doctrove standing square on the offiside. The off drive went straight towards him, and he timed his jump poorly. Denied the batsman some runs there
what a shame, this time he hits it straight to Harbhajan in the same position
smart, soft hands defended into the off side for a cheeky single
ripping turn across the right hander, he lets it hit his pads on to the leg side
defends from middle and off line this time.
pitched up outside off, cut away behind square on the off side for a couple
Mahmudullah comes out of his crease this time, but can't really do much with the flighted ball on leg, and defends
pops up, presumably off just the pads, into the leg side.
swept off middle stump for a single towards square leg
goes through the off side this time and Sehwag who dives away to his left at point can't stop it. Couple of runs into the off side
pitched up outside off, played watchfully to the off side
nice shot! Faster one straightening outside off, and the batsman changed his shot into a late cut, using the pace of the ball and letting it run down to third man
and he gets a single square on the off side to turn the strike
pitched up on middle and off, driven down to long off
smart shot, worked away from outside off into the leg side, wide of mid on for a couple
slides down the leg, past Dhoni and past Rohit at leg slip who really should have stopped that.
tossed high into the air, but Rahim is content with defence to mid on
more intent this time, comes forward and drives firmly to long on
flight outside off, driven straight of mid off for a quick single
slides on to the pads, and he gets it away behind square leg
straighter, on middle, looks to tip it away to the leg side, but can't find the gap.
short outside off, and alarming bounce, but dealth with comfortably
flighted on leg stump, goes for the carpet-sweep to square leg
defence from off stump line.

Jadeja intervenes and breaks the deadlock with a quicker one, outside off. Mahmudullah was lured into the cut, but was late on the shot, and the outside edge was fumbled and then taken nicely by Dhoni.
speared on leg stump and straightening, defended from the crease
straighter one, cramping him as he looked for the cut, but played away safely to the off side
short and down the leg first ball, wasted. Tipped away for a single
played away with the turn into the leg side for another single
short of a length from outside off. Defended to the leg side
opens the face and deflects to the off side this time, but can't beat the fielder at point
short, slow and wide outside off, cut away into the deep
stays on middle and leg line, Rahim tucks it to midwicket for a single
looped outside off, defended to the off side
looks for a cheeky single to the leg side, but Dhoni runs across and saves it
defended again to the on side. Rahim needs a move on.
speared on middle, gets forward and defends down the track
resorts to the only shot with intent he's attempted today - the sweep down to square leg. For one.
flighted on middle and leg, defended to mid on

and Viru's golden arm has not lost any of its charm! Sharp turn this time from outside off, puff of dust as it bounced off, Rahim played outside the line, got some glove on to the pads and it ballooned to the leg side. Dhoni had enough time to take the catch.
short and wide outside off, eased towards the boundary at cover
slips down the leg marginally
turns it away to the leg side for no run
flight this time, comes forward and defends.
another tight ball on off and middle to finish. More defence.
tossed up offie from round the sticks, bit of turn and a hint of leading edge
paddled very fine from outside leg stump and they run through for three
sharp spin, darts in from outside off and it is turned away to square leg

Given! Rohit Sharma has a wicket, but he might have been lucky. Flighted offie outside off, the batsman looks for a cover drive, and there is a definite noise, but the batsman looked unhappy. Might have been bat hitting the ground, but he has to go.
beats him with another flighted offie outside off
Mortaza gauges the turn this time and blocks it to the off side

well, the pacemen are rusty, but India's army of spinners are on the money today. Straighter ball from round the sticks, rushes in past the inside edge and raps him on the back pad. Dead plumb, and that's that.
not much clue about it as it turned in

Sehwag is having a ball with the ball! Another regulation offie outside off, and Shafiul sweeps without much idea, across the line. Raps him on the pads, he is a little forward of the stumps, so umpire Doctrove thinks long and hard but eventually gives him.

almost saw it coming. Sehwag looked as menacing as Malinga did last night, and Rasel was shivering when the genius of part-time off spin dawdled in and landed one from round the sticks on off stump. There was some flight, no spin, no pace, but he played all around it and it found its way to the furniture.

inn2.comm: slanting in from leg stump, Gambhir gets behind and tucks to square leg
short ball, darts from middle towards leg, and Gambhir gets it down to the leg side behind square
short and slightly wide of off stump, in that area where thou shalt not bowl at Sehwag. This time, he does not give it the treatment, playing it beningly to point
and Rahim lives up to his billing as a prospective goallie for the Bangaldesh cricket team. Very wide down the leg, and he dives across acrobatically to save four wides
good ball, coming in from off stump, Sehwag defends resepctfully to the off side
slants on to middle, Sehwag gets back and tucks it down wide of mid on to get off the mark
slower ball, short on Gambhir's leg stump, he plays it away gingerly to square leg
short of a length cutting into Sehwag, who can't work it away
punches it this time from off stump line, off the back foot towards sweeper cover for one
short and wide outside off, Gambhir cuts but not much timing, or placement
sharp movement away from Gambhir who swishes uncertainly. And with Rahim standing up to the stumps, he can't walk down either
we've seen a few of those today. Wide down the leg, all the way to the boundary
short and wide outside off, and this time he cuts it behind square for a couple
on to the pads this time, and worked away for two more. Gauti is away.
Bham! Short and wide outside Sehwag's off stump, he got away with it once, but he's not going to let them go every time. Gets under it and upper cuts it high over the area between point and cover
straightens the line, and Sehwag plays it to the leg side with more respect
perfect. That's what Sehwag does not like, back of a length on the corridor outside off. His feet are late on the forward push and it whizzes past the outside edge
gets some pad on it this time to the leg side
very slow variation, off cutter from outside leg, Gambhir waits for it and turns it away to square leg
smart glance! Sehwag waits for the slow nothing ball that went astray down the leg and tickled it fine for four.
pitched up on off stump, Gambhir gets forward and defends down the pitch
Rahim has gone back after those five wides, and Gambhir walks out of his crease this time, looking to guide it to third man, but cannot get it away
Gambhir's had enough of the nurdling, sashays down the track and cross bats it from wide outside off over the covers for four. In the air, but in the gap.
short and rising outside off, Gambhir is hurried into a cramped cut, and it dribbles to short third man
marginally outside off this time, Gambhir rises on his toes and guides through point
defended to the on side from middle and off, off the back foot to end the over
ball of the innings so far, angles across Gambhir and moves away slightly as he plays inside the line. Very close to the outside edge
and the radar stops working next ball. Wide down the leg
and again, peach! Gambhir is not comfortable with the angle and the seam-movement, but survives without edging.
almost saw it coming. Wide down the leg. Expect another ripper next ball.
no ripper. Stays on the pads and Gambhir glances happily off the back foot for four
back outside off, Gambhir stays back, rises on back foot and works it to the off side for no run
on leg stump again, glanced to fine leg again, not fine enough for four though
copy-book defence down the line from Sehwag, he then holds the pose and smiles. What a guy!
cramped for room outside off, but Gambhir has enough space to guide it behind square on the off
on Sehwag's pads from over the stumps, he is happy to softly nudge it away to midwicket for one. Not much violence from Sehwag. Yet.
worked away from off stump to short midwicket, and he thinks of a quick single but changes his mind
back of a length, moving away off the seam and beating Gambhir's outside edge. Good ball
similar line, slightly shorter and Gambhir gets behind it this time and defends to mid off
hint of inward movement this time, and Gambhir spots it and defends to the off side

and there will be no violence from Sehwag today either! Mortaza nails him with the away swinger, short and wide outside off. It was in Sehwag's hitting area and he went for the expansive cover drive but the away swing did him in, and the faint outside edge was pouched by Rahim.
short and wide lifter outside off, Kohli shoulders arms
straightens the line this time, angles into middle and leg, Kohli defends down the track on the elg side
extra effort outside off, Kohli was not entirely in control of the backfoot check drive and the thickish outside edge went dafely down to third man
Gambhir continues to be troubled by that angle, across him from leg to off, misses the waft outside off
he's frustrated and tries to make room for a cut, but the line is impeccable and so close to off stump, that he is still cramped, and makes no contact
ooh, angles across him, played around his pads in front of middle, but played it away with his wrists to midwicket.. Tight couple too, Gambhir was panting to make his second
short of a length outside off stump, defended off the back foot
pitches on leg stump and finishes on middle, at a friendly pace, and Kohli easily works it away to the leg side
short outside off, with a slip in place, but Gambhir gets it away behind square
very short effort ball, possibly close to being called a wide, but he gets away with it
ooh, short of a length on leg and angling across, Kohli is into his defensive prod early with hard hands, and it pops up dangerously to the right of the bowler, and lands well before mid on
cuts it well this time, but Shuvo at point dives to his right and saves some runs.
squeezed down the leg, big appeal but there was no bat on that, just some thigh en route to the keeper

down the track and absolutely smeared through the covers. Gambhir converted a good length ball into an over pitched offering with his movement and then went through with the shot through the off side. It is the kind of improvisation Sourav Ganguly made famous in his heyday.
down the leg side. Wide.
on the pads again, and clipped away crisply down to fine leg, but it is intercepted near the boundary
regulation back of length ball outside off, Kohli wants nothing to do with it
similar ball outside off, this time Kohli watches it closely and opens the face to square drive to the left of point for a couple
prodigious swing from outside off, tailing away from Gambhir and he got a bottom edge that hurried away to the third man boundary. Poor effort from the fielder at third man, Tamim, gifts the boundary
on to middle and leg, played away to the leg side
cut fiercely from outside off, and a half-stop from the fielder at cover denied the boundary but Kohli was alert to pick three
on Kohli's pads, short of good length, he waited and flicked it away easily for a single
length ball outside off, Gambhir lets it go through
hint of shape away from him, Gambhir gets forward and shoulders arms
tossed up outside off, Kohli leans forward and drives it into the covers
pitched up from round the stumps on Gambhir's off stump, worked away into the leg side
pitched outside leg and thuds into his pads in front of middle and leg. Stifled appeal.
comes forward and looks to work it into the leg side
down the track, but it is fired on his leg stump and he can't do much
sliding down the leg side, Gambhir gets a fine tickle down towards the boundary for a couple
banged in short outside off, Kohli plays and misses off the back foot. Still settling in after the break
tight angle outside off, Kohli rises on the backfoot and plays it down to the off side
length ball coming in from off stump, Kohli gets forward and defends to the off side
airy fairy waft outside the off, similar to the ball that got Sehwag's wicket, except that this one eluded the outside edge
again back of a length outside off, Kohli uses soft hands and drops it down to the off side and takes off for a quick single
pacy delivery on off stump, Gambhir squeezes it down to third man
tossed up on middle and leg, Gambhir chips out and neatly lofts it over the infield into the midwicket region for a brace
stays back this time and tickles it off leg stump line down to fine leg for three.
flighted on off stump, forward defensive from Kohli
looks to score through covers but can't find the gap
nice arm ball, Kohli spots it and plays off the backfoot towards cover
Gambhir thought of sweeping, but the ball was short of a length outside off, so he changed his mind, rocked back and guided it through point for two more
room outside off and Kohli punches it square through the off side towards sweeper cover
a glance that redefines deftness. Short of length sliding on Gambhir's pads he rose and played it late through to fine leg
effort ball outside off, Gambhir fishes for it and misses. Rust
good bowling, after testing him with back of a length balls, throws this further up. Gambhir was caught napping - no footwork at all and threw the bat at it. No contact
pitched up again, but on middle stump, so Gambhir leans across and works it off his toes to midwicket
short of good length on Gambhir's pads. He gets back and taps it to the leg side for a quick one
flighted on off stump from over the stumps, Gambhir can't time the drive down the ground, it runs back to the bowler
goes for the cut just outside off and misses
hangs back on leg stump and tucks it away to the leg side

lovely bit of bowling from Shakib! Flight outside off and turn, luring Kohli forward and breaking past his off stump. His back foot strayed out of the crease and he could not get back entirely in time. Toes on the line, bails in the air. Third umpire takes  a few close looks at it and says Kohli is out.

and he's gone first ball! All those talks of bonus points can stop for a while, since Shakib is creating a chance for Bangladesh here. Arm ball speared in on off and heading straight for leg. Rohit makes a lazy forward lunge with bat tucked behind the pad and it hits him flush in front of middle. The umpire thinks it through and rules him out. Well!
and he gets forward to smother the spin from off stump, and deny Shakib a hat-trick
angled into Gambhir, who taps it off his hips and runs through aggressively for Dhoni
effort ball from round the wickets, Gambhir hangs back in the crease and defends down to the off side
pitched further up, Gambhir gets forward and defends back to the bowler
straight bowling, on the corridor without much variations, but it is tough to deal with. Gambhir shoulders arms
on off stump this time, off a good length, Gambhir opens the face and plays it down to point
effort ball, banged in short outside off but Gambhir was equal to the task, riding the bounce and controlling the glide down behind point
nudged away off the pads to short fine leg for a manic single that Dhoni made possible
tossed up on Dhoni's off stump, he gets forward and drives to long on for one
strays down the leg side, and runs away to the boundary
draws Gambhir forward and he plays it back down the track
lunges forward and works it around the pads into the leg side for one
darts in on leg stump and straightens, but Dhoni gets well forward and it may have been going down
gets bat on it and taps to midwicket. Thinks of a single but changes his mind
length ball outside off, Gambhir is content to hang in the crease and defend
hint of away movement from outside off, again Gambhir hangs back and lets it go. Lots of rust in Gambhir's movements.
slightly shorter this time and it's enough for Gambhir to latch on to. Cut away hard for a couple to sweeper cover
oh Tamim, what have you done! Gambhir has been dropped! He went for the upper cut to the short ball outside off and it looped up for a tame catch at the square fence where Tamim fluffed a dolly
short of a length outside off, Dhoni stays back and punches into the covers
on off and middle line, Dhoni gets behind it and works it to mid on for a single
short and straightening from middle, Dhoni gets back and turns it away to midwicket. A typical ugly little Dhoni nurdle. Very effective.
on Gambhir's pads and tickled away down to fine leg
tapped with soft hands from off stump line, into the covers for one
tossed up outside off, Gambhir hangs back and taps behind point for his fiftieth run. An innings full of struggle, but he's still there.
Dhoni lunges forward and drives into the covers to being India's 100
goes for a cut outside off and misses
more effort, does Dhoni in for pace, judders on his pads and bounces into the off side. They steal a single
keeps it tight on off stump, Gambhir tries to angle it to the off side and finds point
again, on the outside off stump channel, Gambhir cuts without any room and  nearly under-edges onto his castle
this time he again tries to open the face and run it fine of point, but it is intercepteed well
whoa! Gambhir tries to create something from the ennui, jumps out and reels out a sharp cover drive, but it goes straight to the fielder
at long last he perfects the run down to third man, after several failed attempts this over. Single down to third man to retain strike
played away deep into the covers for a single
flighted outside Dhoni's off stump, and he drives it between point and cover
worked away smartly with the turn, very deftly into the open space at square leg for a well-run couple
short ball, Gambhir plays a half-hearted pull for a single to long leg
tapped away to the left of the pitch for another quick single. Dhoni's stealing these
thats cut away late and into the gap behind square, for a couple.
short outside off, Dhoni generates enough power to whiplash the cut into the outfield
short ball and Gambhir does not like it there. He is in no position to pull and instead plays an ungainly swat-slap down into the ground and the fielder at fine leg dives over the ball
short again, angled into him, Gambhir struggles to control it but plays it down for a single to the leg side
short again outside off, Dhoni whacks it into the covers where Shuvo makes a good save and a great throw right back to the bowler, but Gambhir was back in
slightly further up, Dhoni check-drives off back foot into the off side
again, short outside off, Dhoni hangs back and defends down the track
turning in from well outside off, Gambhir waits the turn and cuts into the covers
Dhoni jumps out of the crease, reaches the pitch and flicks nicely down to midwicket. Good fielding at the rope by Mortaza saves a run
worked away off the pads to square leg for a very tight couple. Dhoni was struggling to make it
whoa! Sharp turn, beats Dhoni's outside edge as he plays inside the line. Perilously close to the outside edge and sinfully close to off stump.
taps down to midwicket but can't get it past the fielder
turns in from outside off, tapped into the off side for one
waits for the spin and cuts it away square for a single
tossed up on off stumpm driven back to the bowler
defended from off stump, with the turn to the leg side
driven down wide of long on for a single. India are inching towards a bonus point here
short and wide outside off, Gambhir can't put it away
turns in sharply but Gambhir is up to cutting it away to point for one
Dhoni that chirply fella runs down the track and misses the ball, it hits his pads and quickly runs back. Cheeky
nurdled off the pads square to the leg side for one
Dhoni leans forward and defends back to the bowler
tame defence again, thrown up on middle and straightening
driven straight to cover.
jumps out of the crease, takes it on the full and drives straight down along the ground for four
turns away and takes a hint of outside edge as Dhoni looks to guide into the covers
turning in from outside off, Gambhir hangs in the crease and defends to the leg side
tucks it away towards square leg to hand the strike to Dhoni
Dhoni lunges forward and turns it away to the leg side for one
short of a length outside off, Gambhir check drives to mid off
turned away off the legs behind square leg for a single, and for the strike
worked away with the spin once again square for one
chips out and drives to the off side, Shuvo dives across and makes a half-stop but it escapes for one
punched firmly down to long on for a single
once again, naughty Dhoni scurries down the track and defends. Just for fun.
finally a shot in anger, cut away powerfully to the left of point, but it slows up as it nears the boundary
nudged off the pads, with the spin into the leg side. I should copy this somewhere ready to paste. They have done it too often today.
defended down the pitch from leg stump line
Dhoni leaps out full of intent and dead-bats it, again.

Whump! That's what we want to see Dhoni do when he comes down the track, go through with the full swing and send it flying straight. He was not to the pitch this time, and it was well outside his off stump, so he fore-handed it with disdain into the night.
he's had his adventure for the over, just defends sedately down the track this time
the urgency rubs off on Gambhir who lets rip a smooth cover drive, getting to the pitch, hitting against the spin with minimum fuss along the ground
works this to the left of the bowler for another single
Dhoni thinks of leaping out again, but resists the temptation and plays it away from the crease
works him with the spin into the off side for a single
nicely played. Presses forward, rocks back and then creams it between mid off and cover for a couple
chips out and taps down the ground to long on

and he's removed Gambhir straight away. He never looked at ease against the fast bowlers, got some runs against the spinners, but still needs some confidence ahead of tougher challenges. This one was a length ball on middle stump and rapped Gambhir, hanging in the crease, in front of middle and leg. He was quite late coming down on it, and it would have taken out middle.
much like he did in his first spell, he follows up a good ball with a wide down the leg
worked away off the hips by Raina to get off the mark

Dhoni has had enough. Now that he's forced the field to come in thanks to the Powerplay, he just whacks the length ball hard and high enough to clear cover - only just. It burst through the hands of the jumping fielder and still made it to the cover fence
and that's the end of that. Dhoni seals it with a neat little flick off the back foot, behind square leg and India have won easily, despite looking unconvincing all day.
